dmca.title: Newsfactor alleges Xinhua copied its images
dmca.body:
1. The copyrighted work appears on the following URL http://news.google.com.
2. The material that is in violation of copyright law follows:

* http://news.xinhuanet.com/english/200501/25/xinsrc_ 412010225105486876044.jpg
* http://images.newsfactor.com/images/id/3956/story-apple-itunes-1 .jpg

* http://news.xinhuanet.com/english/2005-01/24/xinsrc_l320102241559296821423. jpg
* http://images.newsfactor.com/images/id/4371/story-networking-6.jpg


3. [Private]
[Private]
Woodland Hills, CA 91367
phone: 818-[Private]
fax: 818-[Private]
email: [Private]@newsfactor.com

4. WHOIS record is invalid and no additional contact information can be found on their website.
China Economic Information Service (XINHUANET-DOM) 
[Private]
Beijing 100031
CN

Domain Name: XINHUANET.COM

Administrative Contact:
[Private] (WL774-ORG)	[Private]@XINHUA.ORG
[Private]
China Economic Information Service of
News Info Center, Xinhua News Agency
Beijing, 100803
CHN
999 999 9999 fax: 999 999 9999

Technical Contact:
[Private] (WZ68-ORG)	[Private]@CNNIC.NET.CN
[Private]
China Economic Information Service of
News Info Center, Xinhua News Agency
Beijing, 100803
CHN
999 999 9999 fax: 999 999 9999

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

7. Signature: [Private]
